# displayDirection

**Instance Property**

The layout direction, either vertical or horizontal, for the given display mode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var displayDirection: PDFDisplayDirection { get set }
```

## Defining Display Direction

- **displaysRTL**: The presentation of pages from right-to-left.
